act_info.full_title: Interim Appropriation for 2022-2023 Act, 2021, S.O. 2021, c. 40, Sched. 15

content.content: 1 Expressions used in this Act have the same meaning as in the Financial Administration Act unless the context requires otherwise.
content.raw_html: 1 Expressions used in this Act have the same meaning as in the Financial Administration Act unless the context requires otherwise.

content.content: 2 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2023, amounts not exceeding a total of $164,883,783,000 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash expenses to be applied to the expenses of the public service that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 2 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2023, amounts not exceeding a total of $164,883,783,000 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash expenses to be applied to the expenses of the public service that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 3 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2023, amounts not exceeding a total of $5,594,993,300 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash investments to be applied to the investments of the public service in capital assets, loans and other investments that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 3 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2023, amounts not exceeding a total of $5,594,993,300 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash investments to be applied to the investments of the public service in capital assets, loans and other investments that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 4 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2023, amounts not exceeding a total of $284,356,800 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the expenses of the Legislative Offices that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 4 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2023, amounts not exceeding a total of $284,356,800 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the expenses of the Legislative Offices that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 5 All expenditures made or recognized under this Act must be charged to the proper appropriation following the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2023. 6 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 7 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
5 All expenditures made or recognized under this Act must be charged to the proper appropriation following the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2023.

6 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

7 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________
